contents.item: Our attitude to others dictate God’s attitude to us
I have to serve with all my might.
contents.owner: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

contents.item: Your calling is in what you read, think and talk about
We are carriers of God
We cannot glorify God when we refuse to celebrate others
Humans are the world’s greatest treasure
It is only God who gives strength and wisdom to fulfill the God-given dream.
contents.owner: Lailah Gifty Akita, Pearls of  Wisdom: Great  mind

contents.item: Every service is a product of double honor
An effective life is a selfless one
Our service as believers is in our help and attitude towards others
Man is the centrality of God’s purpose on earth
You have to be skillful in your time management to be effective in life
The principle of God is love and honor
Travel is costly yes, but it pays dividends too.
contents.owner: Aaron Lauritsen, 100 Days Drive: The Great North American Road Trip

contents.item: Grit is the persistence in following your own destiny
Find time to meditate and see how you can improve your life and achieve your goals
Sometimes, we must travel on the longest path to our sacred-destination.
contents.owner: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

contents.item: The amount of value produced at a certain period depends on the level of focus used to attain it
Don’t let the tide of life shift you away, move intentionally in the right direction
There is always something to appreciate in people
Make sure everything you do is targeted at yielding maximum results
Our ability to convert time determines how great we will become
From someone who doesn't want to share your destiny, you should neither accept a cigarette
contents.owner: Cesare Pavese, The Burning Brand: Diaries, 1935-1950

contents.item: All your solutions are in people, and you can only be free when you love them
To help people is to help God
No amount of money can compensate losing your purpose
Greatness is the quality of time converted into production or value
Destiny waits in the hand of god, shaping the still unshapen..
Worship of God is not restricted to believers alone
Always see the positive aspect of every situation you find yourself
Faith keeps our ships moving, while empathy and the memories of our experiences lead to wisdom.
contents.owner: Suzy Kassem, Rise Up and Salute the Sun: The Writings of Suzy Kassem

contents.item: We are capable of anything and everything
I swear, the best things come to me by accident! Or should I say, effortless destiny?
Destiny is manifested only through action.
contents.owner: Suzy Kassem, Rise Up and Salute the Sun: The Writings of Suzy Kassem

contents.item: The only way to practicalize your love for God is by helping and loving others
Your calling should be your work
You can only derive pleasure from work when it is in the sphere of your calling
You cannot honor God without honoring people first
The nature of Christ is love
Work is an instrument through which you build yourself
Life is fulfilling when you are being productive
The purpose of life has eternal consequences
Stop wasting your life and discover who you are
The nature of God is that we welcome and celebrate one another
God is waiting on you to believe that you are capable
Man is not made for the Sabbath. Rather, the Sabbath is made for man
The only people remembered in history are the ones that dedicate their lives to service and purpose
Life is given for increase and multiplication of the glory of God
Our fellowship with people brings us closer to the Kingdom
You must be a servant if you want to be great in life
...some things are better left in the past. And true things are destined to repeat themselves.
You need to combine your calling with your passion
Work is not about survival alone
You need to know your destiny
It’s not about who they are, but about God’s principle
Miracles await you when you begin to serve people
Have faith in fate. You don't have a choice.
contents.owner: Tapan Ghosh, Faceless The Only Way Out

contents.item: Serve God and get grace to serve people
The principle of God is love
When we relate with people, we indirectly relate with God
You have to be pragmatic, purposeful and goal-oriented to be fully effective
The worship of God is in our attitude to people
The knowledge and successful pursuit of your destiny brings riches into your world
You are living to the fullest when you live to discover and fulfill your purpose
The only need of God is in people
We only perceive God when we receive people
Look for people around you and serve them with love and compassion
Living for your purpose is equivalent to living for the Kingdom of God
Purposefully dedicating time into developing yourself is one of the keys to being effective in life
Celebrate people irrespective of their status or position
I'll always choose you.Gabe Willoughby
Sacrifices by believers should not be done out of pity
Hope isn't destiny. Left passive its nothing more than disappointment deferred
contents.owner: Bill Willingham, Fables, Vol. 16: Super Team

contents.item: The God that is nearest to you in the people around you is the real one you need
Don’t neglect your calling all in the name of employment
If you didn't earn something, it's not worth flaunting.
contents.owner: Aaron Lauritsen, 100 Days Drive: The Great North American Road Trip

contents.item: We should see our calling as our life’s major assignment
We glorify God when we celebrate people’s gifts
See the light in losing your employment
Our fellowship with God cannot be established when we don’t recognize His people
Work is an instrument for fulfilling purpose
You are at liberty to develop yourself when you are self employed
You need to do an inventory of yourself to discover your calling and purpose
Open your eyes to new opportunities
Nothing is possible without time
We must not only exist but find and fulfill our specific mission on earth.

contents.item: You cannot cherish God without loving people
With a clear vision you will arrive at your define-destination.

contents.item: All humans are important to God, so treat them all with love
